verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:7
verses.text: Then on that day David delivered first this psalm to thank the Lord into the hand of Asaph and his brethren.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:8
verses.text: Give thanks unto the Lord, call upon his name, make known his deeds among the people.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:9
verses.text: Sing unto him, sing psalms unto him, talk ye of all his wondrous works.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:10
verses.text: Glory ye in his holy name: let the heart of them rejoice that seek the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:11
verses.text: Seek the Lord and his strength, seek his face continually.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:12
verses.text: Remember his marvellous works that he hath done, his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth;
